trans-unit.source: Provides information about a row of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> objects to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> 物件的資料列相關資訊提供給協助工具用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your program to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form 包含可讓您的程式，以協助工具用戶端應用程式使用的內建的協助工具支援。

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具用戶端應用程式的範例包括螢幕加大工具和公用程式、 語音輸入公用程式、 螢幕小鍵盤、 其他輸入的裝置和鍵盤加強公用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a row of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> objects to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject>類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>類別提供的資料列的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>協助工具用戶端應用程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 代表 visual 一部分的每個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>— 例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>— 也包含 繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>提供包含類別的相關資訊，代表執行動作協助工具用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 有執行個體時，您會想要提供其他資訊，例如名稱或描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，可協助工具用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有限的協助工具資訊的現有控制項，將控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>會報告至協助工具用戶端應用程式的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: 您應該變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>屬性值只能在極少數的情況下，例如，如果您讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>看起來像清單。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: 有時候，您可能需要更多的協助工具資訊或不同協助工具動作，以包含您的自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>。

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂 協助工具，您可以撰寫您自己的類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>類別並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要撰寫實作唯一的自訂動作，例如您的儲存格內特殊點擊測試的自訂資料列標題儲存格應該建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject>類別並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>會使用公開其資料結構<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole>定義的資料值資料表階層架構。

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何公開資料表，以 Microsoft Active Accessibility 的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 公開資料的資料表透過 Microsoft Active Accessibility"在 MSDN library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> class without setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> 類別的新執行個體，而不需要設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />
trans-unit.target: 主控 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取物件的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示可存取物件的界限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the accessible child.
trans-unit.target: 可存取子系的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the child accessible object corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 傳回對應到指定索引的可存取子物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the column header at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，表示位在指定索引上的資料行行首。

trans-unit.source: The order of the child accessible objects that represent a column header corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> properties of the columns.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料行標頭的子系可存取物件的順序對應至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>之資料行屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of children belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬於可存取物件的子系數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of child accessible objects belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 屬於可存取物件的可存取子物件數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of child accessible objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> corresponds to the number of visible columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 屬於 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject> 的可存取子物件數目會對應到 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 中的可見資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A> method includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> in the count of child accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性為 `true`，則 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A> 方法會在可存取子物件的計數中加入 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The string "Top Row".
trans-unit.target: 「上方資料列」字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 可巡覽到另一個可存取物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the object at the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，表示位在指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> 值上的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method will return for each parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A>方法會傳回每個參數值。

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: 參數值

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 傳回值

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> 或

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that is a data row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 可存取物件，表示第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>也就是資料列中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the first column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 表示第一個資料行標頭中的可存取物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is set to `true`, the accessible object represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>屬性設定為`true`，可存取物件代表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>。

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the column header for the last visible column.
trans-unit.target: 可存取物件，表示最後一個可見資料行的資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> values
trans-unit.target: 所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation>值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，其中包含資料行行首的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，其中包含資料行行首的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性已設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject" /> 的父代 (Parent)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取物件的角色。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取物件的值。

trans-unit.source: The string "Top Row".
trans-unit.target: 「上方資料列」字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A>屬性等同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewTopRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
